bug.author: durandg12
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#save>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#save</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The following sentence is outdated and recommends to use a deprecated method:
The 'tf' option is currently disabled (use tf.keras.experimental.export_saved_model instead).

comments.comment: Has this issue already been taken up? I can make the fix otherwise.
I want to work on this issue!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/imskr>@imskr</denchmark-link> If <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nikochiko>@nikochiko</denchmark-link> is not working on it, then you can work on it. If you have already worked on, then submit a PR to update the docs. Thanks!

The docs have been updated. Changes are already visible in rc 2.1 API docs: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.1/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#save>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.1/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#save</denchmark-link>
This issue can be closed. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/durandg12>@durandg12</denchmark-link>
